channel.title: Json on goa
channel.description: Recent content in Json on goa

item.title: encoding/json
item.description:
json

import "github.com/goadesign/encoding/json"

func DecoderFactory

func DecoderFactory() goa.EncoderFactory

DecoderFactory is the default factory used by the goa Consumes DSL

func EncoderFactory

func EncoderFactory() goa.EncoderFactory

EncoderFactory is the default factory used by the goa Produces DSL

type Factory

type Factory struct{}

Factory uses github.com/ugorji/go/codec to act as an DecoderFactory and EncoderFactory

func (*Factory) NewDecoder

func (f *Factory) NewDecoder(r io.Reader) goa.Decoder

NewDecoder returns a new json.Decoder that satisfies goa.Decoder The built in codec.Decoder has a compatible Reset() func

func (*Factory) NewEncoder

func (f *Factory) NewEncoder(w io.Writer) goa.Encoder

NewEncoder returns a new json.Encoder that satisfies goa.Encoder The built in codec.Encoder has a compatible Reset() func
